attributes.action: Provide Public Centre Funding and Tax Incentives to aid the British Film Industry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the magnificent results in both the Baftas, and Oscars by British films, Actors, and Film makers, we urge the Prime Minister to not take credit for these successes when neither he nor his government has helped. But instead, to help the British Film Industry with public money and to encourage other film makers (for example from the U.S.) to make films in the U.K. by providing tax incentives.
